cause.description:
You may take comfort in knowing that organizations like YouthNoise are helping harness positive change on global warming, poverty injustice and other issues. Through YouthNoise, a simple call to action can quickly engage tens of thousands in a cause or urgent request for support. Never before has the impact of such a network been stronger and never before has the YouthNoise mission been more relevant.
Yet, funding is increasingly difficult to secure, so your support is needed. YouthNoise is a not-for-profit organization funded by friends like you. Your gift is tax deductible and goes a long way to supporting the work of inspiring young people. Please give online at www.youthnoise.org/donate
1. Youth can, have, and will change the world!
cause.mission: Are you concerned about the problems facing our country and wonder what pitfalls and triumphs 2009 will bring? Thousands of young people around the globe are feeling the same way.
cause.name: Help Support YouthNoise
